siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Encourage socialization
frontmatter.description: Good connections are hard to come by and those opportunities shouldn't be put off for the 'right' time. Make time. Encourage others.

frontmatter.title: Accept reality, act deliberately
frontmatter.description: Don't try to squeeze productivity in. Use time with family well, choose how to spend time, and act deliberately.

frontmatter.title: Proud dad day
frontmatter.description: Seven years ago I became a dad. So much has changed and I couldn't be prouder of my seven year old son today.

frontmatter.title: Use technology to connect personally
frontmatter.description: Don't let physical distance be the barrier. Use technology to connect personally.
